venue.name: Mass Central Rail Trail Parking Lot

item.description:
I thought it'd be nice to do something outdoors on the last weekend of the summer.
We'll spend a couple hours on the Mass Central Rail Trail and follow that by going to a place called Finders Pub in West Boylston for lunch.
This group did this exact same thing in February and we all had a great time. The trail is very well maintained and even has a few rest stops if needed.
Finders Pub has a great assortment of food and drinks plus free peanuts and pop corn!
So break out your hiking shoes and bring a camea.
If you can't make the hike, join us at Finders Pub. (Call my cell so I can give you an ETA) (508)212-4111.

Finders Pub is located at 171 West Boylston St. in West Boylston Their phone number is (508)835-3707

Please note: If it's going to be raining on Saturday the rain date will be Sunday (same time).
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the one riding the Black Suzuki Burgman (Scooter)
item.name: Hike on The Mass Central Rail Trail
